text: Hangome ki xaʙare az emini [va piruzi] jo tars [va sikast] ʙa onon merasad, [ʙiduni hec tahqiqe] onro fos mesozand, va [-le] agar onro ʙa pajomʙar va farmondehonason ʙozgardonand, afrode az onon, ki ahli [fahmu] istinʙot hastand, hatman, [maslihati e'lom jo kitmoni axʙorro ʙehtar] medonand. Va [ej mu'minon] agar fazlu rahmati Alloh taolo ʙar sumo naʙud, cuz andake [hamagi] az sajton pajravi mekarded
